QuestData.Title: Stonefather's Boon
QuestData.Description: With the Stonefather taken prisoner, our forces are demoralized. Normally any one of mine could take five times his number of stone troggs. But now....$B$BI want you to head out into the field surrounding the town. Plant Stonefather Oremantle's banner near my defenders. Grant them his boon and remind them of that for which they fight.
QuestData.LogDescription: Grant the Stonefather's Boon to 12 Earthen Defenders.
QuestData.RewardText: You have my thanks, $n. You've made all the difference, and the fate of these cowardly stone trogg ambushers is set in stone.$B$BNow we must get about the business of retaking Stonehearth.
